DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1. determine rehabilitation program consist exercise manual therapy reduces pain improves quality life patient shoulder subacromial impingement syndrome ; 2. determine patient likely respond rehabilitation program patient likely respond rehabilitation program The hypothesis : 1. rehabilitation treatment program result significant change pain quality life 2. item history examination identify patient respond favorably respond favorably rehabilitation 6 week , 3 , 6 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Manual Therapy Shoulder Subacromial Impingement Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Subacromial impingement syndrome ( SAIS ) frequent cause shoulder pain . A variety non-surgical treatment advocate correct impairment associate SAIS . Clinical trial support use therapeutic exercise joint mobilization improve pain functional disability associate SAIS . However , patient trial favorable outcome . Moreover , effect sizes trial small moderate . Thus purpose study 1. determine effect multi-modal rehabilitation program consist strengthening , stretch , manual therapy shoulder spine , patient education , posture , functional re-training ; 2. identify patient likely respond rehabilitation start care .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis shoulder impingement syndrome evidence 5 criterion : 1 . Reproduction symptom impingement test : either HawkinsKennedy Neer Test 2 . Pain active shoulder elevation 60 degree 3 . Weakness rotator cuff pain Empty Can test resist shoulder external rotation 4 . Shoulder disability : great equal 20/100 ( 0 = disability ) 5 . Able understand write spoken English Severe pain ; pain > equal 7/10 NPRS ( 0 = pain ) Shoulder surgery affect shoulder Traumatic shoulder dislocation within past 3 month Previous rehabilitation episode shoulder pain Reproduction shoulder pain active passive cervical motion Systemic inflammatory joint disease Global loss passive shoulder ROM , indicative adhesive capsulitis
